duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate with clients, gather necessary documents and information to begin building a case.
Conduct initial research and provide information to the Lawyer.
Manage all administrative responsibilities in the legal office.
Draft the first copy of legal documents.
Conduct initial in-take process and gather detailed information for group of Attorneys.
Perform administrative duties (calendar hearings and deadlines, organize case files, manage logistics, work with clients).
Organize exhibits, documents, evidence, briefs, and appendices.
Aid attorneys with interrogatories and other discovery requests.
Gather relevant information from a variety of sources.
Organize all legal documents in a confidential way.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma (Required) College Degree or Accreditation (Preferred)
